title: extremely high ping at random times - im at my breaking point and need help
body:
i am literally one click away from installing league ... is it because im a bad player? NO ITS BECAUSE I GET FUCKIN BAD LATENCY AT RANDOM FUCKING TIMES UP TO 5000 ms and over EVER SINCE THE LATEST PATCH. seriously have never had a problem then bam... im fucked most games. i was just playing a ranked game(i had played two arams previous all a-ok to test) as urgot top gone 3/0 10 mins in then bam latency spikes to 5000 as i was getting ganked and it sits there attempting to reconnect, it does a minute later im dead and renek has taken tower.... then i sit at base unable to anything because low and behold .... attempting to reconnect... im seriously at my fucking breaking point here, how the fuck do i fix this shit.

adsl2 unlimited download with 4 bar wifi,no programs running in background,tried repair on league client... still gets up to like 5000 pings randomly... over it

update i have examined a few logs and they are just loaded and i mean fucking loaded with these... is this normal

000010.995|       0.0000kb|      0.0000kb added|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "DATA/Characters/HA_AP_PoroSpawner/HA_AP_PoroSpawner.bin" because it's not in the manifest.

replies.body: i disabled the stock windows firewall and it works all good now, thanks everyone for all the help.

Eww, stock firewall XD Nice to hear it!

If you don't have another firewall I suggest getting something (there are free ones outside the stock firewall). Your privacy and PC protection isn't worth getting to play LoL, imo.

You might just need to [open up the proper ports](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8) for LoL.

My only suggestion atm would be to **force a repatch** since you already tried repairing. [Details for that outlined in the Patching Issues page here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) If it's a connection issue [go here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

I'm going to ask a wrenchman to check the thread and see if he has a better idea (they always do).

connection is fine then certain games just spikes off chart, after examining logs has me thinking certain skins/champs animations error forcing it to crash.

forced repatch, hopefully this works.
If it doesn't work, run through the connection troubleshooting guide we linked, and if you need help with it shoot your reply over to Wuks (he's a knowledgeable 'Wrenchman').
i have forced repatch... fingers crossed

If it seems like you continuously disconnect from matches, you may want to try the solutions in the Troubleshooting Connection Issues Riot Games Support article! Let me know if anything works for you!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
